scripts.robot: npm run getStatic && npm run makeGamePages && npm run makeNewsPages && npm run makeAboutPages && npm run makeTagPages && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; rm -rf .next; rm -rf public; rm -rf ./pages/games/*/; rm -rf ./pages/news/*/; rm -rf ./pages/about/*/; rm -rf ./pages/tags/*/
scripts.export: next export -o dist && cp vercel.json dist/vercel.json
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf node_modules/react; rm -rf node_modules/react-dom; rm -rf node_modules/@types/react
